caption.title: Reserves and haplotype diversity.
caption.p: Haplotype diversity of the five species studied overlaid onto the map of reserves and protected natural areas. Protected natural areas follow the designations of the Mexican Commission of Protected Natural Areas (CONANP, www.gob.mx/conanp) and the Texas State Parks and Wildlife Department ( https://tpwd.texas.gov/state-parks/). (A) Map with all protected areas. (B) Detail of areas in the central region of the Chihuahuan Desert. (C) Detail of the southernmost areas of the Chihuahuan Desert. See Table 2 for numbers and the full names of these areas.
